0.1.name: wordpress/jetpack-follow-link-for-p2
0.1.description:
Easily subscribe to a P2 comment thread without commenting using a "Follow" action link like WordPress.com has.

This plugin requires Jetpack and P2 to both be activated. It doesn't yet allow you to unfollow, and there are some minor interface quirks.

Happy to receive feedback, questions, feature suggestions, and pull requests
